Package HSL.controller.entity

Class ExampleEntityFormController

java.lang.Object
HSL.controller.entity.ExampleEntityFormController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/entity") public class ExampleEntityFormController extends Object
Controller for the example entities form view.

This serves as an adapter between the UI and the services layer.

Author:
Bernardo Martínez Garrido

    • showEntityForm

      @GetMapping(path="/edit") public String showEntityForm()
      Shows the entity edition view.

      Actually it just returns the name of the view. Spring will take care of the rest.

      Returns:
      the name for the entity edition view
